title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 419.2 - Proposals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 419.2 - Proposals

State Regulations

Social services districts desiring to apply for special
day care funds shall submit a proposal to the department by a date specified by
the commissioner. The proposal shall include a project summary and rationale, a
budget, objectives, project approach, a description of the method to be used to
evaluate the effectiveness of the program, staffing needs, implementation
potential beyond the project funding period and a description of how the
project will coordinate with the local Private Industrial Council established
through the Job Training Partnership Act ( P.L. 97-300) and other employment
and training projects operating in the districts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
419.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
